data.name: Holofit by Holodia
data.description:
Some call it a workout, we call it a game.

Connect your rower, bike or elliptical to your Quest, or try our bodyweight exercises (boxing, skiing, squats, and more), and start your fitness journey through our HOLOworlds. 

The HOLOFIT Annual Subscription is now 40% off! Risk-free with a 7-day free trial! 

ü™ê 15+ virtual worlds ‚Äì Paris, Antarctica, Cyberpunk World, Tropical, Aurvangar, Underwater, and more 

üëü 6 workout modes ‚Äì Guided HIIT, Fat burn programs, Performance, Race mode, and more 

‚≠êÔ∏è Monthly & daily challenges ‚Äì A community-wide workout adventure through the HOLOuniverse

ü•á Companion app - Measure calorie burn, and save your workout data in our Android/iOS companion app. Integrates with Apple Health, Google Fit, and Strava. 

üéâ Monthly updates ‚Äì Regular updates with new features, upgrades, and more

üéÅ Check out the free demo or start your 7-day free trial to try the full HOLOFIT experience risk-free. Manage your subscription in the Meta Quest mobile app. 

HOLOFIT works with any rowing machine out of the box, and any bicycle or elliptical with an additional cadence sensor. Or you can use it without any fitness machines, in our Freestyle mode for various no-equipment bodyweight exercises.

For any questions, please contact support@holodia.com
